description.name: Discord Alert Pro
description.tagline: Smart and secure WHMCS notifications to Discord.
description.long: Discord Alert Pro delivers real-time alerts from WHMCS to your Discord channels. Featuring admin name display, country flags from client IP, role mention support, avatar control, dynamic colors, and full lock system for protection.
features: Real-time ticket alerts with full details
Client country with flag via IP
Discord role ping and avatar support
Secure developer lock with key file
